Namespace: Cocoon

Cocoon

The "Cocoon" object holds all the CocoonJS Extensions and other stuff needed for the CocoonJS environment.

Namespaces

InApp

Members

<static> version

Properties:
Name Type Description
version string

Current version of the library.
Example
console.log(Cocoon.version);
